text: If you have questions about what the vaccine means for you as a person with epilepsy living in the UK, join us on Tuesday 2 February 2021 at 1pm for a Facebook Live Q&A session with Professor Ley Sander about the #COVID19 #vaccine and #epilepsy here https://t.co/SDb4qZEcIC https://t.co/o8gBqL9oLJ
